text:
Bashirul Haq (24 June 1942 – 4 April 2020) was a Bangladeshi architect, planner and educator. He was born in Brahmanbaria, Bengal Presidency, British India (now Bangladesh). In his 45 years of professional career, Haq has designed more than 300 buildings. Bashirul Haq & Associates in 1977. He is best known for his buildings Bhatshala House, Kalindi Apartments, Chayanaut Bhaban and ASA Head Office Building.
Haq died on 4 April 2020 at the age of 77.
